tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I worked hard and understood nearly everything. He will pass anyone but if your going for an A, you need to be somewhat lucky on test questions. There is no room for error in this class, fist test I got a 98.5 and second test I got a 63. Worked hard for both tests but the second one was considerably harder and questions never mentioned in class.

comments: He is lecture heavy and reads right off the slide. So monotone it makes me want to fall asleep. His tests dont reflect the book, and what he tells you to study is completely different than the test. Doesnt explain a thing and reads off the slides word for word. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

comments: Mr. Seelos is a great economics teacher. He works as a portfolio manager, so he has real world experience and will share it with the class, which is helpful and somewhat inspiring. Definitely take him!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: lectures are unbelievably boring. Tim is very rude to students. His tests are way too hard and worded terribly. I wouldn\'t recommend him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: The lectures were boring but that could just be because the class was 2:40 long. He is super willing to answer students\' questions. Tests are based almost completely on the book, so if you study that you will get a good grade. I would take another class with him.

comments: Very dry lecture which doesn\'t help to get the point across. Definitely need to put a lot of time in to learning the subject yourself. Tests are very difficult so do all the homework to make up for it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: He can be boring in lectures, but i suggest going I went to all lectures and got and A in the class. Tim is clear and if you ask questions he will help. Don\'t walk out in the middle of class he will call you out, just go to class and look at the power points.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Tim Seelos was an alright professor. His class was long (took a night class thats why) but overall it was an interesting subject. His lectures are okay but don\'t really do enough if you want a good grade in his class. His tests really reflect book readings so get ready to read your book. It will be your best friend. Overall, not a terrible teacher.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: His lectures are a waste of time. He doesn\'t go in depth about the topic and he just reads off his powerpoint most of the time. His exams are not anything like his homework assignment, but the assignments are easy. The textbook is a MUST NEED in order to pass.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: His lectures are a complete waste of time, doesnt talk about the things we will be tested on he just kills time, reads off the powerpoint but doesnt actually go in depth because he doesnt know the material well enough. Your teacher for this class is going to be your classmates and the textbook.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: EASY!!! 3 exams and a final. All multiple choice. Online assignments weekly. Be ready to get board so bring a laptop and play some league of legends. He doesn\'t give a crap. Take this course, super easy A.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Terrible... Tests are so terrible, he just assumes you know what is being talked about in the question and doesn\'t explain anything. DONT TAKE FROM HIM!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Don\'t bother going to lecture, all he does is directly read the slides and does a poor job at explaining concepts and then gives a difficult exam, you should be fine if you read the textbook and the slides. Your best case is avoiding him as a professor at all costs.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Tim chose a good book and teaches by the slides, which are decent. Main issue is he fails to answer questions, as he doesn\'t seem to ever understand the question he is being asked. He is fairly boring and you need to multitask to stay awake. He has no humor. Only real bonus is that he stays on topic (except when answering questions).

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Lectures are boring, just reads a powerpoint provided for him. The wording on exams gets confusing at times so read carefully. Do the extra credit or you will regret it. Read the book and powerpoints before class and you will understand everything perfectly. On the 2nd exam there will be a math problem so go to class to see how it is done.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I enjoyed the lectures because they are applicable to personal investments. He is a Portfolio Manager and he is able to provide a lot of suggestion about how to manage and construct a portfolio. Exams can be difficult, but he is more than willing to help you if you do your part. I recommend this professor.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  LECTURE HEAVY (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I actually enjoyed the lectures, he teaches information you can apply to your own investments. He is also a Portfolio Manager so he is able to provide a lot of suggestions about how to construct and manage a portfolio. Exams can be tough but if you work hard in the class he is always willing to help you. I would take another class with this prof

comments: Not a very good teacher and class is really boring. Might have done better in it if I could pay attention but it was really hard because he is sooo uninteresting.
